name: Wheelanes
type: This is an used car selling website.
description: At first, after clilcking the site URL, you will see the Home route. In the Home page, there is 4 cards where the categories are shown. Below the category section, there is some advertised products. After this section, there is a section which portrays the statistics of progress of this company. And at last there is a footer.

After clicking the 'see' button on the category card, you will be redirected to the respective route. For example, if you click on the 'Sedan' card's 'See' button, the products of 'Sedan' Category will be shown.

On the Navbar, you will find 'Products' option. After clicking that, you will see all the category cards. And also there is a button called 'See all cars'. This button will redirect you to that route where you will see all the cars that is listed for sale in this website.

After logging in, you will see an option called 'Dashboard'. If you login as a buyer, you will see 'My orders'. And if you login as a 'seller', you will see 'Sell a car', 'My buyers' and 'My products' options.
In the blog page, you will find answers of some questions.

name: PiJournal
type: This is a journal service provider's website.
description: Signle Page Application
Easy Register and Login Process
6 Different and Unique Services
There is a review section in every services details page. There will appear all the reviews that users have submitted.
User can get all the reviews he/she has submitted in the My Reviews page.
User can edit and delete his/her review from My Reviews page.
User can easily log out whenever he/she wants.

name: Skill Hunter
type: This is a skill sharing website, where people can learn and teach through courses.
description: Single Page Application
Authenticated by firebase
In Courses route, there is 6 courses. Each course is dynamic
One can easily download the pdf file of a course
There is a blog section where you will find 4 answers of questions.
Another route is FAQ. There is the answers of freequently asked questions.

name: Book Verse
type: This website keeps track of users reading list and reading time. It helps the user to be focused.
description: Single Page Application
Prereserverd book and can be added in reading list
Autometic calculation of the time that need to complete the books added in the reading list.
Rest facility that keep track of the resting time while reading
Some blog paragraphs are there.

name: Quiz Mania
type: In this website people can take a quick test on a certain topic.
description: There are four different topics
Every topic has some MCQ questions
User can easily take a quick test of his/her knowledge on a specific topic
After selecting an option as an answer of a question, if the answer is right, a notification will appear and congratulate. And if it is wrong, a notification will appear with the right answer.
